---
title: Somatoagnosia
subtitle: Neuropathological lack of awareness of the body
---

Lack of awareness of body (may not have a impariment in body ?) 
Pt feels parts of body have disappeared or pt has lack of awareness of part of body
Lack of awareness of body stx/ relationship of body parts to oneself or to others (aka Body Agnosia)
Remedial tx: Associate sensory input with adaptive motor response (rub the appropriate body part as PT points to it), verbal identification, pictures or with use of textured cloth
